select * from (select f.free_num, fr_content, call_time, reg_date, one_content, price, f.name, tel, career, gender, location, c.name category, f.changename, r.rcount from freelancer_profile p join freelancer f on(p.free_num = f.free_num) join categories c on(f.cate_num = c.cate_num) left join (select free_num ,count(*) rcount from review group by free_num) r on(f.free_num = r.free_num) where status = 'Y' and f.free_num = #{freeNum})
left join (select free_num, status from dibs where cus_num = #{cusNum}) using(free_num)

select r.review_num, r.reg_date, r.star, r.content, c.name, s.name service from review r, customer c, freelancer f, categories s where r.cus_num = c.cus_num and r.free_num = f.free_num and f.cate_num = s.cate_num and r.free_num = #{freeNum}

select d.cus_num, d.free_num, d.reg_date, f.name, f.location, f.changename, c.name catename from dibs d, freelancer f, categories c where d.free_num = f.free_num and f.cate_num = c.cate_num and cus_num = #{cusNum} and d.status = 'Y'

select f.free_num, f.name, r.avgstar, f.career, f.changename from (select free_num, round(avg(star),1) avgstar from review group by free_num) r, freelancer f, freelancer_profile p where r.free_num = f.free_num and f.free_num = p.free_num
